QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cast(pat.medrec_key as bigint) as medrec_key, l.pat_key, observation as value_source_value, test, case when lower(observation) = 'negative' then 45878583 when lower(observation) = 'positive' then 46237248 when lower(observation) = 'not detected' then 45880296 else 0 end as value_as_concept_id, spec_day_number, spec_time_of_day, pat.adm_phy from {sc}.pat pat JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND pat.medrec_key = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE join {sc}.lab_result l on pat.pat_key = l.pat_key order by cast(pat.medrec_key as bigint)
